title: News & Events
description: Stay up to date with new data releases, platform improvements, and case studies from our high-throughput protein microarray projects.

post1.title: Launching our human proteome-wide microarray panel
post1.description: We now support more than 21,000 human proteins on a single wafer, enabling large-scale antibody and serum profiling in a single experiment.

post2.title: Case study: Autoantibody signatures in early-stage disease
post2.description: Learn how high-throughput protein microarrays can reveal subtle changes in autoantibody profiles before clinical symptoms appear.
